name: TEST TEST TEST
description:
TEST TEST TEST is a retro pixel-art point-and-click puzzle adventure where you must escape a time loop as an overworked office employee.
Find clues, gather information, and solve cryptic puzzles with alternate reality game elements.
Will you able to release yourself from the clutch of time itself? Or will you be stuck in this reality forever?
